(NOM :ORTH "abandonment"
     :PLURAL *NONE*
     :VERB "abandon"
     :NOM-TYPE ((VERB-NOM))
     :VERB-SUBJ ((DET-POSS)
                 (PP :PVAL ("by")))
     :SUBJ-ATTRIBUTE ((COMMUNICATOR))
     :VERB-SUBC ((NOM-NP :SUBJECT ((DET-POSS)
                                   (PP :PVAL ("by")))
                         :OBJECT ((DET-POSS)
                                  (PP :PVAL ("of"))))
                 (NOM-NP-PP :SUBJECT ((DET-POSS)
                                      (PP :PVAL ("by")))
                            :OBJECT ((DET-POSS)
                                     (PP :PVAL ("of")))
                            :PVAL ("for" "to"))
                 (NOM-NP-TO-INF-OC :SUBJECT ((DET-POSS)
                                             (PP :PVAL ("by")))
                                   :OBJECT ((DET-POSS)
                                            (PP :PVAL ("of")))
                                   :NOM-SUBC ((TO-INF :OC T)))
                 (NOM-NP-AS-NP :SUBJECT ((DET-POSS)
                                         (PP :PVAL ("by")))
                               :OBJECT ((DET-POSS)
                                        (PP :PVAL ("of")))
                               :NOM-SUBC ((AS-NP-PHRASE :OC T))))
     :DONE T
     :REVISED "Jan-Update@sapir  17:48 1/13/1999")

(NOM :ORTH "absorption"
     :PLURAL "absorptions"
     :PLURAL-FREQ "8:924 plur:sing"
     :VERB "absorb"
     :NOM-TYPE ((VERB-NOM))
     :VERB-SUBJ ((N-N-MOD)
                 (DET-POSS)
                 (PP :PVAL ("by")))
     :VERB-SUBC ((NOM-NP-PP :SUBJECT ((N-N-MOD)
                                      (DET-POSS)
                                      (PP :PVAL ("by")))
                            :OBJECT ((DET-POSS)
                                     (N-N-MOD)
                                     (PP :PVAL ("of")))
                            :PVAL ("from" "in" "into")
                            :NOT ((AND1 :OBJECT ((DET-POSS))
                                        :PVAL ("from"))
                                  (AND2 :SUBJECT ((N-N-MOD))
                                        :OBJECT ((N-N-MOD)))))
                 (NOM-NP :SUBJECT ((N-N-MOD)
                                   (DET-POSS)
                                   (PP :PVAL ("by")))
                         :OBJECT ((DET-POSS)
                                  (N-N-MOD)
                                  (PP :PVAL ("of")))
                         :REQUIRED ((OBJECT :DET-POSS-ONLY T
                                            :N-N-MOD-ONLY T))))
     :DONE T
     :REVISED "reevesr@sapir  22:53 1/22/1998")

                         :PVAL ("from"))

                                         (PP :PVAL ("of" "by")))
                               :NOM-SUBC ((P-ING :PVAL ("from")

(NOM :ORTH "acceleration"
     :PLURAL "accelerations"
     :PLURAL-FREQ "not found"
     :VERB "accelerate"
     :NOM-TYPE ((VERB-NOM))
     :FEATURES ((SUBJ-OBJ-ALT)
                (NUNITP-BY-NUNITP-ALT))
     :VERB-SUBJ ((DET-POSS))
     :OBJ-ATTRIBUTE ((NOT-COMMUNICATOR)
                     (NOT-NUNIT))
     :VERB-SUBC ((NOM-NP-PP :SUBJECT ((DET-POSS))
                            :OBJECT ((DET-POSS)
                                     (N-N-MOD)
                                     (PP :PVAL ("of")))
                            :PVAL ("through")
                            :REQUIRED ((OBJECT)
                                       (SUBJECT)))
                 (NOM-PP :SUBJECT ((DET-POSS)
                                   (N-N-MOD)
                                   (PP :PVAL ("of")))
                         :PVAL ("through")
                         :REQUIRED ((SUBJECT))
                         :ALTERNATES T)
                 (NOM-NP :SUBJECT ((DET-POSS))
                         :OBJECT ((DET-POSS)
                                  (N-N-MOD)
                                  (PP :PVAL ("of")))
                         :REQUIRED ((OBJECT)
                                    (SUBJECT)))
                 (NOM-INTRANS :SUBJECT ((DET-POSS)
                                        (N-N-MOD)
                                        (PP :PVAL ("in" "of")))
                              :REQUIRED ((SUBJECT))
                              :ALTERNATES T)
                 (NOM-NUNITP-TO-RANGE :SUBJECT ((DET-POSS)
                                                (N-N-MOD)
                                                (PP :PVAL ("in" "of")))
                                      :NOM-ROLE-FOR-NUNITP ((N-N-MOD)
                                                            (PP :PVAL ("of")))
                                      :ALTERNATES T
                                      :PVAL ("from")
                                      :PVAL2 ("of" "to")
                                      :NOM-ROLE-FOR-PVAL2 ((N-N-MOD))
                                      :REQUIRED ((SUBJECT)))
                 (NOM-NP-NUNITP-TO-RANGE :SUBJECT ((DET-POSS))
                                         :OBJECT ((N-N-MOD)
                                                  (PP :PVAL ("in" "of")))
                                         :NOM-ROLE-FOR-NUNITP ((PP :PVAL ("of")))
                                         :PVAL ("from")
                                         :PVAL2 ("of" "to")
                                         :NOM-ROLE-FOR-PVAL2 ((N-N-MOD))
                                         :REQUIRED ((OBJECT)
                                                    (SUBJECT))))
     :DONE T
     :REVISED ("reevesr@nonki  17:21 10/1/1998"
               "reevesr@nonki  17:24 10/1/1998"
               "reevesr@nonki  17:33 10/1/1998"
               "reevesr@nonki  17:46 12/17/1998"))

                            :PVAL ("at" "from" "into" "for")

                                      (N-N-MOD)
                                      (PP :PVAL ("by")))
                            :OBJECT ((PP :PVAL ("against")))
                            :PVAL ("of"))

                                   (N-N-MOD)
                                   (PP :PVAL ("by")))
                         :OBJECT ((PP :PVAL ("against" "of")))

                                            (N-N-MOD)
                                            (PP :PVAL ("by")))

                                  :NOM-SUBC ((P-ING :PVAL ("of")

(NOM :ORTH "acquittal"
     :PLURAL "acquittals"
     :PLURAL-FREQ "not rare"
     :VERB "acquit"
     :NOM-TYPE ((VERB-NOM))
     :VERB-SUBJ ((DET-POSS)
                 (PP :PVAL ("by")))
     :SUBJ-ATTRIBUTE ((COMMUNICATOR))
     :OBJ-ATTRIBUTE ((NHUMAN))
     :VERB-SUBC ((NOM-NP-PP :SUBJECT ((DET-POSS)
                                      (PP :PVAL ("by")))
                            :OBJECT ((DET-POSS)
                                     (N-N-MOD)
                                     (PP :PVAL ("of")))
                            :PVAL ("on" "of")
                            :NOT ((AND1 :OBJECT ((N-N-MOD)
                                                 (PP :PVAL ("of")))
                                        :PVAL ("of"))))
                 (NOM-NP :SUBJECT ((DET-POSS)
                                   (PP :PVAL ("by")))

                                        (PP :PVAL ("of")))

     :SUBJ-ATTRIBUTE ((NHUMAN))
     :OBJ-ATTRIBUTE ((COMMUNICATOR))
     :VERB-SUBC ((NOM-NP-PP :SUBJECT ((N-N-MOD)
                                      (DET-POSS)
                                      (PP :PVAL ("by")))
                            :OBJECT ((PP :PVAL ("to")))
                            :PVAL ("about" "on")
                            :NOM-ROLE-FOR-PVAL ((N-N-MOD))
                            :REQUIRED ((OBJECT)))
                 (NOM-NP :SUBJECT ((N-N-MOD)
                                   (DET-POSS)
                                   (PP :PVAL ("by")))
                         :OBJECT ((PP :PVAL ("to")))
                         :REQUIRED ((OBJECT)))
                 (NOM-POSSING :SUBJECT ((N-N-MOD)
                                        (DET-POSS)
                                        (PP :PVAL ("by")))
                              :NOM-SUBC ((P-POSSING :PVAL ("of"
                                                           "in favor of"))))
                 (NOM-PP :SUBJECT ((N-N-MOD)
                                   (DET-POSS)
                                   (PP :PVAL ("by")))
                         :PVAL ("on")
                         :NOM-ROLE-FOR-PVAL ((N-N-MOD)))
                 (NOM-INTRANS :SUBJECT ((DET-POSS)
                                        (N-N-MOD)
                                        (PP :PVAL ("of" "by")))
                              :REQUIRED ((SUBJECT)))
                 (NOM-NP-P-WH-S :SUBJECT ((N-N-MOD)
                                          (DET-POSS)
                                          (PP :PVAL ("by")))
                                :OBJECT ((PP :PVAL ("to")))
                                :NOM-SUBC ((P-WH :PVAL ("about" "on")
                                                 :WH-S T))
                                :REQUIRED ((OBJECT)))
                 (NOM-NP-TO-INF-OC :SUBJECT ((N-N-MOD)
                                             (DET-POSS)
                                             (PP :PVAL ("by")))
                                   :OBJECT ((PP :PVAL ("to")))
                                   :NOM-SUBC ((TO-INF :OC T)))
                 (NOM-P-WH-S :SUBJECT ((N-N-MOD)
                                       (DET-POSS)
                                       (PP :PVAL ("by")))
                             :NOM-SUBC ((P-WH :PVAL ("about" "on")
                                              :WH-S T)))
                 (NOM-P-POSSING :SUBJECT ((N-N-MOD)
                                          (DET-POSS)
                                          (PP :PVAL ("by")))
                                :NOM-SUBC ((P-POSSING :PVAL ("against"))))
                 (NOM-S-SUBJUNCT :SUBJECT ((N-N-MOD)
                                           (DET-POSS)
                                           (PP :PVAL ("by")))
                                 :NOM-SUBC ((SENT :S-SUBJUNCT T)))
                 (NOM-NP-S :SUBJECT ((N-N-MOD)
                                     (DET-POSS)
                                     (PP :PVAL ("by")))
                           :OBJECT ((PP :PVAL ("to")))
                           :NOM-SUBC ((SENT :THAT-S T))
                           :REQUIRED ((OBJECT)))
                 (NOM-NP-P-POSSING :SUBJECT ((N-N-MOD)
                                             (DET-POSS)
                                             (PP :PVAL ("by")))
                                   :OBJECT ((PP :PVAL ("to")))
                                   :NOM-SUBC ((P-POSSING :PVAL ("about" "on")))
                                   :REQUIRED ((OBJECT))))
     :DONE T
     :REVISED "reevesr@nonki  18:56 2/10/1999")

(NOM :ORTH "agreement"
     :PLURAL "agreements"
     :PLURAL-FREQ "not rare"
     :VERB "agree"
     :NOUN ((RESULT))
     :NOM-TYPE ((VERB-NOM))
     :VERB-SUBJ ((DET-POSS)
                 (N-N-MOD)
                 (PP :PVAL ("between" "amongst" "among" "by" "of")))
     :SUBJ-ATTRIBUTE ((COMMUNICATOR))
     :VERB-SUBC ((NOM-INTRANS-RECIP :SUBJECT ((DET-POSS)
                                              (N-N-MOD)
                                              (PP :PVAL ("between"
                                                         "amongst"
                                                         "among"
                                                         "of"
                                                         "by")))
                                    :REQUIRED ((SUBJECT)))
                 (NOM-PP :SUBJECT ((DET-POSS)
                                   (N-N-MOD)
                                   (PP :PVAL ("between"
                                              "amongst"
                                              "among"
                                              "of"
                                              "by")))
                         :PVAL ("about" "on" "to" "upon" "with"))
                 (NOM-PP-PP :SUBJECT ((DET-POSS)
                                      (N-N-MOD)
                                      (PP :PVAL ("of" "by")))
                            :PVAL ("about" "on" "to" "upon")
                            :PVAL2 ("with"))
                 (NOM-PP-HOW-TO-INF :SUBJECT ((DET-POSS)
                                              (N-N-MOD)
                                              (PP :PVAL ("of" "by")))
                                    :PVAL1 ("with")
                                    :NOM-SUBC ((P-WH :PVAL ("about" "on")
                                                     :HOW-TO-INF T)))
                 (NOM-P-POSSING :SUBJECT ((DET-POSS)
                                          (N-N-MOD)
                                          (PP :PVAL ("between"
                                                     "amongst"
                                                     "among"
                                                     "of"
                                                     "by")))
                                :NOM-SUBC ((P-POSSING :PVAL ("about"
                                                             "on"
                                                             "upon"
                                                             "to"))))
                 (NOM-PP-P-POSSING :SUBJECT ((DET-POSS)
                                             (PP :PVAL ("of" "by"))))
                 (NOM-TO-INF-SC :SUBJECT ((DET-POSS)
                                          (N-N-MOD)
                                          (PP :PVAL ("between"
                                                     "amongst"
                                                     "among"
                                                     "of"
                                                     "by")))
                                :NOM-SUBC ((TO-INF :SC T)))
                 (NOM-THAT-S :SUBJECT ((DET-POSS)
                                       (N-N-MOD)
                                       (PP :PVAL ("between"
                                                  "amongst"
                                                  "among"
                                                  "of"
                                                  "by")))
                             :NOM-SUBC ((SENT :THAT-S T)))
                 (NOM-PP-THAT-S :SUBJECT ((DET-POSS)
                                          (N-N-MOD)
                                          (PP :PVAL ("of" "by")))
                                :PVAL1 ("with")
                                :NOM-SUBC ((SENT :THAT-S T)))
                 (NOM-P-WH-S :SUBJECT ((DET-POSS)
                                       (N-N-MOD)
                                       (PP :PVAL ("between"
                                                  "amongst"
                                                  "among"
                                                  "of"
                                                  "by")))
                             :NOM-SUBC ((P-WH :PVAL ("about" "on" "upon")
                                              :WH-S T)))
                 (NOM-PP-P-WH-S :SUBJECT ((DET-POSS)
                                          (N-N-MOD)
                                          (PP :PVAL ("of" "by")))
                                :PVAL1 ("about" "on" "upon" "over")
                                :NOM-SUBC ((P-WH :PVAL ("with")
                                                 :WH-S T))))
     :DONE T
     :REVISED ("reevesr@nonki  19:1 11/13/1998"
               "reevesr@nonki  15:31 11/16/1998"
               "Fall Update@sapir  17:6 1/13/1999" "macleod@nonki  10/04/2001"))

                 (DET-POSS)

     :VERB-SUBC ((NOM-NP :SUBJECT ((DET-POSS)
                                   (PP :PVAL ("by")))
                         :OBJECT ((DET-POSS)
                                  (N-N-MOD)
                                  (PP :PVAL ("of"))))
                 (NOM-NP-PP :SUBJECT ((DET-POSS)
                                      (PP :PVAL ("by")))
                            :OBJECT ((DET-POSS)
                                     (N-N-MOD)
                                     (PP :PVAL ("of")))
                            :PVAL ("among" "amongst"))
                 (NOM-NP-TO-NP :SUBJECT ((DET-POSS)
                                         (PP :PVAL ("by")))
                               :OBJECT ((DET-POSS)
                                        (N-N-MOD)
                                        (PP :PVAL ("of")))
                               :IND-OBJ ((PP :PVAL ("to"))
                                         (DET-POSS))))
     :DONE T
     :REVISED "Fall Update@sapir  17:6 1/13/1999")

                                      (N-N-MOD)

                            :NOM-SUBC ((P-WH :PVAL ("of")
                                             :HOW-S T)))

                                         (N-N-MOD)
                                         (PP :PVAL ("by")))
                               :OBJECT ((DET-POSS)
                                        (PP :PVAL ("of")))
                               :NOM-SUBC ((AS-NP-PHRASE :OC T))))

                                      (PP :PVAL ("by")))
                            :PVAL ("for")
                            :PVAL2 ("with"))
                 (NOM-PP :SUBJECT ((N-N-MOD)
                                   (DET-POSS)
                                   (PP :PVAL ("between" "among" "of" "by")))
                         :PVAL ("for" "with"))
                 (NOM-INTRANS-RECIP :SUBJECT ((N-N-MOD)
                                              (DET-POSS)
                                              (PP :PVAL ("between"
                                                         "among"
                                                         "of"
                                                         "by")))
                                    :REQUIRED ((SUBJECT))))
     :DONE T
     :REVISED ("barrett@sapir  15:0 4/30/1998"
               "reevesr@jespersen  18:26 9/1/1998"
               "reevesr@nonki  15:31 11/16/1998"
               "reevesr@nonki  16:49 11/16/1998"
               "reevesr@nonki  13:54 12/21/1998" "macleod@nonki  10/04/2001"))

     :VERB "bill"
     :NOUN ((RARE-NOM)
            (RESULT))
     :NOM-TYPE ((VERB-NOM))
     :VERB-SUBJ ((PP :PVAL ("from"))
                 (N-N-MOD)
                 (DET-POSS))
     :SUBJ-ATTRIBUTE ((COMMUNICATOR))
     :OBJ-ATTRIBUTE ((COMMUNICATOR))
     :VERB-SUBC ((NOM-NP-TO-NP :SUBJECT ((PP :PVAL ("from"))
                                         (N-N-MOD)
                                         (DET-POSS))
                               :OBJECT ((N-N-MOD)
                                        (PP :PVAL ("of")))
                               :IND-OBJ ((PP :PVAL ("to"))
                                         (DET-POSS)
                                         (N-N-MOD)))
                 (NOM-NP-PP :SUBJECT ((PP :PVAL ("from"))
                                      (N-N-MOD)
                                      (DET-POSS))
                            :OBJECT ((DET-POSS)
                                     (PP :PVAL ("to")))
                            :PVAL ("for" "by")
                            :NOT ((AND1 :OBJECT ((DET-POSS))
                                        :PVAL ("by"))))
                 (NOM-NP :SUBJECT ((PP :PVAL ("from"))
                                   (N-N-MOD)
                                   (DET-POSS))
                         :OBJECT ((DET-POSS)
                                  (N-N-MOD)
                                  (PP :PVAL ("to"))))

                                             (N-N-MOD)
                                             (DET-POSS))
                                   :OBJECT ((DET-POSS)
                                            (PP :PVAL ("to")))
                                   :NOM-SUBC ((P-POSSING :PVAL ("for")))))
     :COMMENTS "noun -> verb"
     :REVISED ("barrett@sapir  16:4 5/18/1998"
               "reevesr@jespersen  16:41 9/3/1998"))

(NOM :ORTH "call"
     :PLURAL "calls"
     :PLURAL-FREQ "not rare"
     :VERB "call"
     :NOM-TYPE ((VERB-NOM))
     :VERB-SUBJ ((N-N-MOD)
                 (DET-POSS)
                 (PP :PVAL ("by")))
     :SUBJ-ATTRIBUTE ((NHUMAN))
     :OBJ-ATTRIBUTE ((COMMUNICATOR))
     :VERB-SUBC ((NOM-NP-PP :SUBJECT ((N-N-MOD)
                                      (DET-POSS)
                                      (PP :PVAL ("by")))
                            :OBJECT ((PP :PVAL ("to")))
                            :PVAL ("about" "on" "from" "for" "by")
                            :NOM-ROLE-FOR-PVAL ((N-N-MOD))
                            :REQUIRED ((OBJECT)))
                 (NOM-INTRANS :SUBJECT ((N-N-MOD)
                                        (DET-POSS)
                                        (PP :PVAL ("by")))
                              :REQUIRED ((SUBJECT)))
                 (NOM-PART-PP :SUBJECT ((N-N-MOD)
                                        (DET-POSS)
                                        (PP :PVAL ("by")))
                              :ADVAL ("away" "in" "out" "over")
                              :ADVAL-NOM ("in" "out")
                              :PVAL ("from" "to"))
                 (NOM-PART :SUBJECT ((N-N-MOD)
                                     (DET-POSS)
                                     (PP :PVAL ("by")))
                           :ADVAL ("by" "back" "around" "up" "out" "in")
                           :ADVAL-NOM ("back" "up"))
                 (NOM-PP :SUBJECT ((N-N-MOD)
                                   (DET-POSS)
                                   (PP :PVAL ("by")))
                         :PVAL ("about" "on" "for" "upon"))
                 (NOM-NP :SUBJECT ((N-N-MOD)
                                   (DET-POSS)
                                   (PP :PVAL ("by")))
                         :OBJECT ((PP :PVAL ("to")))
                         :REQUIRED ((OBJECT)))
                 (NOM-NP-P-POSSING :SUBJECT ((N-N-MOD)
                                             (DET-POSS)
                                             (PP :PVAL ("by")))
                                   :OBJECT ((PP :PVAL ("to")))
                                   :NOM-SUBC ((P-POSSING :PVAL ("about")))
                                   :REQUIRED ((OBJECT)))
                 (NOM-P-WH-S :SUBJECT ((N-N-MOD)
                                       (DET-POSS)
                                       (PP :PVAL ("by")))
                             :NOM-SUBC ((P-WH :PVAL ("about")
                                              :WH-S T)))
                 (NOM-NP-P-NP-ING :SUBJECT ((N-N-MOD)
                                            (DET-POSS)
                                            (PP :PVAL ("by")))
                                  :OBJECT ((PP :PVAL ("to")))
                                  :PVAL ("about")
                                  :NOM-SUBC ((ING :P-OC T)))
                 (NOM-P-POSSING :SUBJECT ((N-N-MOD)
                                          (DET-POSS)
                                          (PP :PVAL ("by")))
                                :NOM-SUBC ((P-POSSING :PVAL ("about"))))
                 (NOM-FOR-TO-INF :SUBJECT ((N-N-MOD)
                                           (DET-POSS)
                                           (PP :PVAL ("by")))
                                 :NOM-SUBC ((FOR-TO-INF)))
                 (NOM-NP-P-WH-S :SUBJECT ((N-N-MOD)
                                          (DET-POSS)
                                          (PP :PVAL ("by")))
                                :OBJECT ((PP :PVAL ("to")))
                                :NOM-SUBC ((P-WH :PVAL ("about")
                                                 :WH-S T))
                                :REQUIRED ((OBJECT))))

                (SUBJ-OBJ-ALT))

                 (N-N-MOD)

                                      (N-N-MOD)
                                      (PP :PVAL ("by")))
                            :OBJECT ((DET-POSS)
                                     (N-N-MOD)
                                     (PP :PVAL ("of")))
                            :PVAL ("for" "from" "into" "in" "toward" "through")
                            :REQUIRED ((OBJECT)
                                       (SUBJECT)))
                 (NOM-PP :SUBJECT ((N-N-MOD)
                                   (PP :PVAL ("of")))
                         :PVAL ("around" "from" "on")
                         :REQUIRED ((SUBJECT))
                         :ALTERNATES T)

                                        (PP :PVAL ("of")))
                              :REQUIRED ((SUBJECT))
                              :ALTERNATES T)

                                   (N-N-MOD)

                         :OBJECT ((DET-POSS)
                                  (N-N-MOD)

                         :REQUIRED ((OBJECT)
                                    (SUBJECT)))

                                             (N-N-MOD)
                                             (PP :PVAL ("by")))
                                   :OBJECT ((DET-POSS)
                                            (N-N-MOD)
                                            (PP :PVAL ("of")))
                                   :NOM-SUBC ((P-POSSING :PVAL ("for"))))
                 (NOM-NP-AS-NP-SC :SUBJECT ((DET-POSS)
                                            (N-N-MOD)
                                            (PP :PVAL ("by")))
                                  :OBJECT ((DET-POSS)
                                           (N-N-MOD)
                                           (PP :PVAL ("of")))
                                  :NOM-SUBC ((AS-NP-PHRASE :SC T))))

(NOM :ORTH "complaint"
     :PLURAL "complaints"
     :PLURAL-FREQ "not rare"
     :VERB "complain"
     :NOUN ((RESULT))
     :NOM-TYPE ((VERB-NOM))
     :VERB-SUBJ ((PP :PVAL ("from"))
                 (N-N-MOD)
                 (DET-POSS))
     :SUBJ-ATTRIBUTE ((COMMUNICATOR))
     :VERB-SUBC ((NOM-INTRANS :SUBJECT ((PP :PVAL ("from"))
                                        (N-N-MOD)
                                        (DET-POSS))
                              :REQUIRED ((SUBJECT)))
                 (NOM-PP-PP :SUBJECT ((PP :PVAL ("from"))
                                      (N-N-MOD)
                                      (DET-POSS))
                            :PVAL ("about" "of")
                            :PVAL2 ("to"))
                 (NOM-PP :SUBJECT ((PP :PVAL ("from"))
                                   (N-N-MOD)
                                   (DET-POSS))
                         :PVAL ("at" "about" "of" "to")
                         :NOM-ROLE-FOR-PVAL ((N-N-MOD))
                         :NOT ((AND1 :PVAL ("to")
                                     :NOM-ROLE-FOR-PVAL ((N-N-MOD)))))
                 (NOM-S :SUBJECT ((PP :PVAL ("from"))
                                  (N-N-MOD)
                                  (DET-POSS))

                 (PP :PVAL ("by")))
     :VERB-SUBC ((NOM-NP-PP :SUBJECT ((DET-POSS)
                                      (PP :PVAL ("by")))
                            :OBJECT ((DET-POSS)
                                     (PP :PVAL ("of")))
                            :PVAL ("to" "within"))
                 (NOM-NP :SUBJECT ((DET-POSS)
                                   (PP :PVAL ("by")))
                         :OBJECT ((DET-POSS)
                                  (PP :PVAL ("of")))
                         :REQUIRED ((OBJECT :DET-POSS-ONLY T)))
                 (NOM-NP-P-ING-OC :SUBJECT ((DET-POSS)
                                            (PP :PVAL ("by")))
                                  :OBJECT ((DET-POSS)
                                           (PP :PVAL ("of")))
                                  :NOM-SUBC ((P-ING :PVAL ("to")
                                                    :OC T))))
     :DONE T
     :REVISED "barrett@jespersen  15:19 4/1/1998")

     :PLURAL "confirmations"
     :VERB "confirm"
     :NOM-TYPE ((VERB-NOM))
     :VERB-SUBJ ((DET-POSS)
                 (PP :PVAL ("by")))
     :VERB-SUBC ((NOM-S :SUBJECT ((DET-POSS)
                                  (PP :PVAL ("by")))
                        :NOM-SUBC ((SENT :THAT-S T)))

                                   (PP :PVAL ("by")))
                         :OBJECT ((DET-POSS)
                                  (N-N-MOD)
                                  (PP :PVAL ("of"))))

                                         (PP :PVAL ("by")))
                               :OBJECT ((DET-POSS)
                                        (PP :PVAL ("of")))
                               :NOM-SUBC ((AS-NP-PHRASE :OC T)))
                 (NOM-WH-S :SUBJECT ((DET-POSS)
                                     (PP :PVAL ("by")))
                           :NOM-SUBC ((P-WH :PVAL ("of")
                                            :WHERE-WHEN-S T
                                            :WH-S T)))
                 (NOM-PP-THAT-S :SUBJECT ((DET-POSS)
                                          (PP :PVAL ("by")))
                                :PVAL1 ("to")
                                :NOM-SUBC ((SENT :THAT-S T))))
     :DONE T)

                         :REQUIRED ((OBJECT)
                                    (SUBJECT)))
                 (NOM-INTRANS :SUBJECT ((DET-POSS)
                                        (N-N-MOD)
                                        (PP :PVAL ("of")))
                              :REQUIRED ((SUBJECT))
                              :ALTERNATES T)
                 (NOM-PP :SUBJECT ((DET-POSS)
                                   (N-N-MOD)
                                   (PP :PVAL ("of")))
                         :PVAL ("against" "into" "onto" "through")
                         :REQUIRED ((SUBJECT))
                         :ALTERNATES T)
                 (NOM-NP-PP :SUBJECT ((DET-POSS))
                            :OBJECT ((N-N-MOD)
                                     (PP :PVAL ("of")))
                            :PVAL ("against" "into" "through")
                            :REQUIRED ((OBJECT)
                                       (SUBJECT))))
     :DONE T
     :REVISED ("barrett@jespersen  13:12 2/11/1998"
               "barrett@jespersen  12:7 2/13/1998"
               "barrett@jespersen  12:42 2/25/1998"
               "barrett@jespersen  14:58 2/26/1998"

                                         (PP :PVAL ("by")))
                               :OBJECT ((DET-POSS)
                                        (PP :PVAL ("of")))
                               :NOM-SUBC ((AS-NP-PHRASE :OC T))))
     :DONE T
     :REVISED "Fall Update@sapir  17:7 1/13/1999")

                                       (DET-POSS)

                                          (DET-POSS)

(NOM :ORTH "derivation"
     :PLURAL "derivations"
     :PLURAL-FREQ "not rare"
     :VERB "derive"
     :NOM-TYPE ((VERB-NOM))
     :VERB-SUBJ ((DET-POSS)
                 (PP :PVAL ("of")))
     :VERB-SUBC ((NOM-NP-PP :SUBJECT ((DET-POSS)
                                      (PP :PVAL ("by")))
                            :OBJECT ((N-N-MOD)
                                     (PP :PVAL ("of")))
                            :PVAL ("by" "from" "through" "out of")
                            :REQUIRED ((OBJECT)))
                 (NOM-PP :SUBJECT ((DET-POSS)
                                   (PP :PVAL ("of")))
                         :PVAL ("from"))
                 (NOM-NP :SUBJECT ((DET-POSS)
                                   (PP :PVAL ("of")))
                         :OBJECT ((N-N-MOD)
                                  (PP :PVAL ("of")))))
     :DONE T
     :REVISED "reevesr@nonki  16:24 12/2/1998")
(NOM :ORTH "descent"
     :PLURAL "descents"
     :VERB "descend"
     :NOM-TYPE ((VERB-NOM))
     :VERB-SUBJ ((DET-POSS)
                 (PP :PVAL ("by")))
     :VERB-SUBC ((NOM-NP :SUBJECT ((DET-POSS)
                                   (PP :PVAL ("by")))
                         :OBJECT ((N-N-MOD)
                                  (PP :PVAL ("of")))
                         :REQUIRED ((OBJECT)))
                 (NOM-PP :SUBJECT ((DET-POSS)
                                   (PP :PVAL ("by")))
                         :PVAL ("into" "from" "to"))
                 (NOM-ADVP :SUBJECT ((DET-POSS)
                                     (PP :PVAL ("by")))
                           :NOM-SUBC ((ADJP)))
                 (NOM-INTRANS :SUBJECT ((DET-POSS)
                                        (PP :PVAL ("by")))
                              :REQUIRED ((SUBJECT))))
     :DONE T)
(NOM :ORTH "description"
     :PLURAL "descriptions"
     :PLURAL-FREQ "not rare"
     :VERB "describe"
     :NOM-TYPE ((VERB-NOM))
     :VERB-SUBJ ((DET-POSS)
                 (PP :PVAL ("by")))
     :SUBJ-ATTRIBUTE ((COMMUNICATOR))
     :VERB-SUBC ((NOM-NP :SUBJECT ((DET-POSS)
                                   (PP :PVAL ("by")))
                         :OBJECT ((DET-POSS)
                                  (N-N-MOD)
                                  (PP :PVAL ("of"))))
                 (NOM-NP-PP :SUBJECT ((DET-POSS)
                                      (PP :PVAL ("by")))
                            :OBJECT ((DET-POSS)
                                     (PP :PVAL ("of")))
                            :PVAL ("to"))
                 (NOM-PP-HOW-TO-INF :SUBJECT ((DET-POSS)
                                              (PP :PVAL ("by")))
                                    :PVAL1 *NONE*
                                    :NOM-SUBC ((P-WH :PVAL ("of")
                                                     :HOW-TO-INF T)))
                 (NOM-NP-AS-ADJP :SUBJECT ((DET-POSS)
                                           (PP :PVAL ("by")))
                                 :OBJECT ((DET-POSS)
                                          (PP :PVAL ("of")))
                                 :NOM-SUBC ((AS-ADJP :OC T)))
                 (NOM-NP-AS-NP :SUBJECT ((DET-POSS)
                                         (PP :PVAL ("by")))
                               :OBJECT ((DET-POSS)
                                        (PP :PVAL ("of")))
                               :NOM-SUBC ((AS-NP-PHRASE :OC T))))
     :DONE T
     :REVISED ("reevesr@sapir  17:23 12/5/1997"
               "Fall Update@sapir  17:7 1/13/1999"))

(NOM :ORTH "designation"
     :PLURAL "designations"
     :PLURAL-FREQ "not rare"
     :VERB "designate"
     :NOM-TYPE ((VERB-NOM))
     :VERB-SUBJ ((DET-POSS)
                 (PP :PVAL ("by")))
     :SUBJ-ATTRIBUTE ((COMMUNICATOR))
     :VERB-SUBC ((NOM-NP-PP :SUBJECT ((DET-POSS)
                                      (PP :PVAL ("by")))
                            :OBJECT ((DET-POSS)
                                     (N-N-MOD)
                                     (PP :PVAL ("of")))
                            :PVAL ("by" "for")
                            :NOT ((AND1 :OBJECT ((DET-POSS)
                                                 (N-N-MOD))
                                        :PVAL ("by"))))
                 (NOM-NP :SUBJECT ((DET-POSS)
                                   (PP :PVAL ("by")))
                         :OBJECT ((DET-POSS)
                                  (N-N-MOD)
                                  (PP :PVAL ("of")))
                         :REQUIRED ((OBJECT :DET-POSS-ONLY T)))
                 (NOM-NP-AS-NP :SUBJECT ((DET-POSS)
                                         (PP :PVAL ("by")))
                               :OBJECT ((DET-POSS)
                                        (PP :PVAL ("of")))
                               :NOM-SUBC ((AS-NP-PHRASE :OC T)))
                 (NOM-NP-AS-ADJP :SUBJECT ((DET-POSS)
                                           (PP :PVAL ("by")))
                                 :OBJECT ((DET-POSS)
                                          (PP :PVAL ("of")))
                                 :NOM-SUBC ((AS-ADJP :OC T)))
                 (NOM-NP-TO-INF-OC :SUBJECT ((DET-POSS)
                                             (PP :PVAL ("by")))
                                   :OBJECT ((PP :PVAL ("of")))
                                   :NOM-SUBC ((TO-INF :OC T)))
                 (NOM-NP-P-ING-OC :SUBJECT ((DET-POSS)
                                            (PP :PVAL ("by")))
                                  :OBJECT ((DET-POSS)
                                           (PP :PVAL ("of")))
                                  :NOM-SUBC ((P-ING :PVAL ("for")
                                                    :OC T))))
     :DONE T
     :REVISED "reevesr@sapir  18:40 5/18/1998")

(NOM :ORTH "desire"
     :PLURAL "desires"
     :PLURAL-FREQ "not-rare"
     :VERB "desire"
     :NOM-TYPE ((VERB-NOM))
     :VERB-SUBJ ((N-N-MOD)
                 (DET-POSS)
                 (PP :PVAL ("of")))
     :SUBJ-ATTRIBUTE ((COMMUNICATOR))
     :VERB-SUBC ((NOM-ING-SC :SUBJECT ((PP :PVAL ("of"))
                                       (N-N-MOD)
                                       (DET-POSS))
                             :NOM-SUBC ((P-ING :PVAL ("for")
                                               :SC T)))
                 (NOM-NP :SUBJECT ((PP :PVAL ("of"))
                                   (N-N-MOD)
                                   (DET-POSS))
                         :OBJECT ((N-N-MOD)
                                  (PP :PVAL ("for" "of")))
                         :REQUIRED ((SUBJECT :DET-POSS-ONLY T)))
                 (NOM-S-SUBJUNCT :SUBJECT ((DET-POSS)
                                           (PP :PVAL ("by")))
                                 :NOM-SUBC ((SENT :S-SUBJUNCT T))
                                 :REQUIRED ((SUBJECT)))
                 (NOM-TO-INF-SC :SUBJECT ((DET-POSS)
                                          (PP :PVAL ("by")))
                                :NOM-SUBC ((TO-INF :SC T)))
                 (NOM-FOR-TO-INF :SUBJECT ((DET-POSS)
                                           (PP :PVAL ("by")))
                                 :NOM-SUBC ((FOR-TO-INF))))
     :DONE T
     :REVISED ("barrett@sapir  16:4 5/18/1998"
               "reevesr@jespersen  19:14 9/2/1998"))

(NOM :ORTH "development"
     :PLURAL "developments"
     :PLURAL-FREQ "not rare"
     :VERB "develop"
     :NOM-TYPE ((VERB-NOM))
     :FEATURES ((SUBJ-OBJ-ALT))
     :VERB-SUBJ ((N-N-MOD)
                 (DET-POSS)
                 (PP :PVAL ("by")))
     :SUBJ-ATTRIBUTE ((COMMUNICATOR))
     :VERB-SUBC ((NOM-NP :SUBJECT ((N-N-MOD)
                                   (DET-POSS)
                                   (PP :PVAL ("by")))
                         :OBJECT ((DET-POSS)
                                  (N-N-MOD)
                                  (PP :PVAL ("of")))
                         :REQUIRED ((OBJECT)
                                    (SUBJECT)))
                 (NOM-INTRANS :SUBJECT ((DET-POSS)
                                        (N-N-MOD)
                                        (PP :PVAL ("of")))
                              :REQUIRED ((SUBJECT))
                              :ALTERNATES T)
                 (NOM-AS-NP :SUBJECT ((DET-POSS)
                                      (PP :PVAL ("of")))
                            :REQUIRED ((SUBJECT))
                            :ALTERNATES T)
                 (NOM-PP :SUBJECT ((DET-POSS)
                                   (N-N-MOD)
                                   (PP :PVAL ("of")))
                         :PVAL ("from" "into" "through" "toward" "out of")
                         :REQUIRED ((SUBJECT))
                         :ALTERNATES T)
                 (NOM-NP-PP :SUBJECT ((N-N-MOD)
                                      (DET-POSS)
                                      (PP :PVAL ("by")))
                            :OBJECT ((DET-POSS)
                                     (N-N-MOD)
                                     (PP :PVAL ("of")))
                            :PVAL ("into" "from" "out of" "toward")
                            :REQUIRED ((OBJECT)
                                       (SUBJECT)))
                 (NOM-NP-AS-NP :SUBJECT ((DET-POSS)
                                         (PP :PVAL ("by")))
                               :OBJECT ((DET-POSS)
                                        (PP :PVAL ("of")))
                               :NOM-SUBC ((AS-NP-PHRASE :OC T))
                               :REQUIRED ((OBJECT)
                                          (SUBJECT))))
     :DONE T
     :REVISED "reevesr@nonki  17:16 9/29/1998")

                 (PP :PVAL ("by")))
     :VERB-SUBC ((NOM-NP :SUBJECT ((DET-POSS)
                                   (PP :PVAL ("by")))
                         :OBJECT ((DET-POSS)
                                  (N-N-MOD)
                                  (PP :PVAL ("of")))
                         :REQUIRED ((SUBJECT)
                                    (OBJECT :DET-POSS-ONLY T)))
                 (NOM-INTRANS :SUBJECT ((DET-POSS)
                                        (N-N-MOD)
                                        (PP :PVAL ("of")))
                              :REQUIRED ((SUBJECT :DET-POSS-ONLY T))
                              :ALTERNATES T))
     :DONE T
     :REVISED "reevesr@sapir  17:50 5/26/1998")

                 (PP :PVAL ("by")))
     :VERB-SUBC ((NOM-NP :SUBJECT ((N-N-MOD)
                                   (DET-POSS)
                                   (PP :PVAL ("by")))
                         :OBJECT ((DET-POSS)
                                  (N-N-MOD)
                                  (PP :PVAL ("of")))
                         :REQUIRED ((OBJECT)
                                    (SUBJECT)))
                 (NOM-INTRANS :SUBJECT ((DET-POSS)
                                        (N-N-MOD)
                                        (PP :PVAL ("of")))
                              :REQUIRED ((SUBJECT))
                              :ALTERNATES T)
                 (NOM-NP-PP :SUBJECT ((N-N-MOD)
                                      (DET-POSS)
                                      (PP :PVAL ("by")))
                            :OBJECT ((DET-POSS)
                                     (N-N-MOD)
                                     (PP :PVAL ("of")))
                            :PVAL ("around" "throughout")))
     :DONE T

     :NOM-TYPE ((VERB-NOM))
     :FEATURES ((VCOLLECTIVE))
     :VERB-SUBJ ((N-N-MOD)
                 (DET-POSS)
                 (PP :PVAL ("between" "among" "by")))
     :VERB-SUBC ((NOM-NP-PP :SUBJECT ((DET-POSS)
                                      (PP :PVAL ("by")))
                            :OBJECT ((DET-POSS)
                                     (N-N-MOD)
                                     (PP :PVAL ("of")))
                            :PVAL ("among" "between" "by" "from" "into" "in"
                                   "over" "with")
                            :REQUIRED ((OBJECT)))
                 (NOM-INTRANS-RECIP :SUBJECT ((N-N-MOD)
                                              (DET-POSS)
                                              (PP :PVAL ("between"
                                                         "among"
                                                         "by")))
                                    :REQUIRED ((SUBJECT)))
                 (NOM-PP :SUBJECT ((N-N-MOD)
                                   (DET-POSS)
                                   (PP :PVAL ("between" "among" "by")))
                         :PVAL ("in" "into" "over")
                         :NOT ((AND1 :SUBJECT ((PP :PVAL ("among" "between")))
                                     :PVAL ("into" "in"))))
                 (NOM-NP :SUBJECT ((DET-POSS)
                                   (N-N-MOD)
                                   (PP :PVAL ("by")))
                         :OBJECT ((DET-POSS)
                                  (N-N-MOD)
                                  (PP :PVAL ("of")))
                         :REQUIRED ((OBJECT))))
     :DONE T

                         :OBJECT ((DET-POSS)
                                  (N-N-MOD)
                                  (PP :PVAL ("to" "of"))))
                 (NOM-NP-PP :SUBJECT ((DET-POSS)
                                      (PP :PVAL ("by")))
                            :OBJECT ((DET-POSS)
                                     (PP :PVAL ("of")))
                            :PVAL ("at" "in"))
                 (NOM-NP-TO-INF-OC :SUBJECT ((DET-POSS)
                                             (PP :PVAL ("by")))
                                   :OBJECT ((PP :PVAL ("to" "of")))
                                   :NOM-SUBC ((TO-INF :OC T)))
                 (NOM-POSSING :SUBJECT ((DET-POSS)
                                        (PP :PVAL ("by")))
                              :NOM-SUBC ((P-POSSING :PVAL ("of"))))
                 (NOM-NP-P-ING-OC :SUBJECT ((DET-POSS)
                                            (PP :PVAL ("by")))
                                  :OBJECT ((DET-POSS)
                                           (PP :PVAL ("of")))
                                  :NOM-SUBC ((P-ING :PVAL ("at" "in")
                                                    :OC T))))

                 (PP :PVAL ("by")))

                                     (PP :PVAL ("of")))
                            :PVAL ("p-loc"))
                 (NOM-NP :SUBJECT ((DET-POSS)
                                   (PP :PVAL ("by")))
                         :OBJECT ((DET-POSS)
                                  (PP :PVAL ("of")))
                         :REQUIRED ((OBJECT :DET-POSS-ONLY T)))

                                         (PP :PVAL ("by")))
                               :OBJECT ((DET-POSS)
                                        (PP :PVAL ("of")))
                               :NOM-SUBC ((AS-NP-PHRASE :OC T))))

     :VERB-SUBJ ((N-N-MOD)
                 (DET-POSS)
                 (PP :PVAL ("by")))
     :VERB-SUBC ((NOM-NP-PP :SUBJECT ((N-N-MOD)
                                      (DET-POSS)
                                      (PP :PVAL ("by")))
                            :OBJECT ((PP :PVAL ("of")))
                            :PVAL ("from" "for"))
                 (NOM-NP :SUBJECT ((N-N-MOD)
                                   (DET-POSS)
                                   (PP :PVAL ("by")))
                         :OBJECT ((PP :PVAL ("of"))))
                 (NOM-TO-INF-SC :SUBJECT ((DET-POSS)
                                          (PP :PVAL ("by")))
                                :NOM-SUBC ((TO-INF :SC T)))
                 (NOM-S :SUBJECT ((N-N-MOD)
                                  (DET-POSS)
                                  (PP :PVAL ("by")))
                        :NOM-SUBC ((SENT :THAT-S T))))
     :DONE T)
(NOM :ORTH "experience"
     :PLURAL "experiences"
     :PLURAL-FREQ "not rare"
     :VERB "experience"
     :NOUN ((RESULT))
     :NOM-TYPE ((VERB-NOM))
     :VERB-SUBJ ((N-N-MOD)
                 (DET-POSS)
                 (PP :PVAL ("by" "of")))
     :SUBJ-ATTRIBUTE ((COMMUNICATOR))
     :VERB-SUBC ((NOM-ING-SC :SUBJECT ((N-N-MOD)
                                       (DET-POSS)
                                       (PP :PVAL ("of" "by")))
                             :NOM-SUBC ((P-ING :PVAL ("of")
                                               :SC T)))
                 (NOM-NP :SUBJECT ((N-N-MOD)
                                   (DET-POSS)
                                   (PP :PVAL ("of" "by")))
                         :OBJECT ((N-N-MOD)
                                  (PP :PVAL ("of")))
                         :REQUIRED ((SUBJECT :DET-POSS-ONLY T)))
                 (NOM-NP-AS-NP :SUBJECT ((N-N-MOD)
                                         (DET-POSS)
                                         (PP :PVAL ("of" "by")))
                               :OBJECT ((PP :PVAL ("of")))
                               :NOM-SUBC ((AS-NP-PHRASE :OC T))))
     :COMMENTS "default wrong  NOM-ING-SC -->ing without pp-of"
     :DONE T
     :REVISED ("reevesr@sapir  19:49 4/9/1998"
               "reevesr@sapir  21:17 4/27/1998"))

     :VERB "fear"
     :NOM-TYPE ((VERB-NOM))
     :VERB-SUBJ ((DET-POSS)
                 (PP :PVAL ("by" "of")))
     :SUBJ-ATTRIBUTE ((NHUMAN))
     :VERB-SUBC ((NOM-NP :SUBJECT ((DET-POSS)
                                   (PP :PVAL ("of" "by")))
                         :OBJECT ((PP :PVAL ("of")))
                         :REQUIRED ((OBJECT)))
                 (NOM-PP :SUBJECT ((DET-POSS)
                                   (PP :PVAL ("of" "by")))
                         :PVAL ("for"))
                 (NOM-ING-SC :SUBJECT ((DET-POSS)
                                       (PP :PVAL ("of" "by")))
                             :NOM-SUBC ((P-ING :PVAL ("of")
                                               :SC T)))
                 (NOM-S :SUBJECT ((DET-POSS)
                                  (PP :PVAL ("of" "by")))
                        :NOM-SUBC ((SENT :THAT-S T)))
                 (NOM-INTRANS :SUBJECT ((DET-POSS)
                                        (PP :PVAL ("of" "by")))
                              :REQUIRED ((SUBJECT)))
                 (NOM-NP-AS-NP :SUBJECT ((DET-POSS)
                                         (PP :PVAL ("of" "by")))
                               :OBJECT ((PP :PVAL ("of")))
                               :NOM-SUBC ((AS-NP-PHRASE :OC T))))
     :COMMENTS "I don't get intrans expt in neg -> \"never fear\""
     :DONE T
     :REVISED "barrett@sapir  14:26 4/22/1998")

                         :REQUIRED ((OBJECT)))

(NOM :ORTH "indication"
     :PLURAL "indications"
     :VERB "indicate"
     :NOUN-SUBC ((NOUN-PP :PVAL ("about" "on"))
                 (NOUN-P-POSSING :PVAL ("about" "on"))
                 (NOUN-PP-P-HOW-TO-INF :PVAL1 ("to")
                                       :PVAL ("about" "on"))
                 (NOUN-P-WH-S :PVAL ("about" "on")))
     :NOM-TYPE ((VERB-NOM))
     :VERB-SUBJ ((DET-POSS)
                 (PP :PVAL ("from" "by")))
     :VERB-SUBC ((NOM-NP :SUBJECT ((DET-POSS)
                                   (PP :PVAL ("from" "by")))
                         :OBJECT ((N-N-MOD)
                                  (PP :PVAL ("of")))
                         :REQUIRED ((SUBJECT :DET-POSS-ONLY T)))
                 (NOM-NP-PP :SUBJECT ((DET-POSS)
                                      (PP :PVAL ("by")))
                            :OBJECT ((N-N-MOD)
                                     (PP :PVAL ("of")))
                            :PVAL ("to"))
                 (NOM-S :SUBJECT ((DET-POSS)
                                  (PP :PVAL ("from" "by")))
                        :NOM-SUBC ((SENT :THAT-S T)))
                 (NOM-PP-THAT-S :SUBJECT ((DET-POSS)
                                          (PP :PVAL ("from" "by")))
                                :PVAL1 ("to")
                                :NOM-SUBC ((SENT :THAT-S T)))
                 (NOM-WH-S :SUBJECT ((DET-POSS)
                                     (PP :PVAL ("from" "by")))
                           :NOM-SUBC ((P-WH :PVAL ("of")
                                            :WHERE-WHEN-S T
                                            :WH-S T)))
                 (NOM-HOW-S :SUBJECT ((DET-POSS)
                                      (PP :PVAL ("from" "by")))
                            :NOM-SUBC ((P-WH :PVAL ("of")
                                             :HOW-S T)))
                 (NOM-PP-WH-S :SUBJECT ((DET-POSS)
                                        (PP :PVAL ("from" "by")))
                              :PVAL1 ("to")
                              :NOM-SUBC ((P-WH :PVAL ("of")
                                               :WH-S T))))
     :COMMENTS "NOUN USAGE   where subject-role is pp FROM the plural is good, not otherwise"
     :DONE T
     :REVISED ("reevesr@sapir  12:50 10/9/1997"
               "Fall Update@sapir  17:7 1/13/1999"))

                                      (DET-POSS)
                                      (PP :PVAL ("by")))
                            :OBJECT ((DET-POSS)
                                     (N-N-MOD)
                                     (PP :PVAL ("of")))
                            :PVAL ("for"))
                 (NOM-NP-P-POSSING :SUBJECT ((N-N-MOD)
                                             (DET-POSS)
                                             (PP :PVAL ("by")))
                                   :OBJECT ((DET-POSS)
                                            (PP :PVAL ("of")))
                                   :NOM-SUBC ((P-POSSING :PVAL ("for"))))
                 (NOM-NP-AS-NP :SUBJECT ((N-N-MOD)
                                         (DET-POSS)
                                         (PP :PVAL ("by")))
                               :OBJECT ((DET-POSS)
                                        (PP :PVAL ("of")))
                               :NOM-SUBC ((AS-NP-PHRASE :OC T))))
     :DONE T)

     :PLURAL "judgments"
     :VERB "judge"
     :NOUN-SUBC ((NOUN-PP :PVAL ("on"))
                 (NOUN-P-WH-S :PVAL ("about" "on")))
     :NOM-TYPE ((VERB-NOM))
     :VERB-SUBJ ((DET-POSS)
                 (N-N-MOD)

                                      (N-N-MOD)
                                      (PP :PVAL ("by")))
                            :OBJECT ((DET-POSS)
                                     (PP :PVAL ("of")))
                            :PVAL ("by" "for" "on" "in")
                            :REQUIRED ((OBJECT))
                            :NOT ((AND1 :OBJECT ((DET-POSS))
                                        :PVAL ("for"))))
                 (NOM-INTRANS :SUBJECT ((DET-POSS)
                                        (N-N-MOD)
                                        (PP :PVAL ("from" "of" "by")))
                              :REQUIRED ((SUBJECT)))

                                   (N-N-MOD)

                         :PVAL ("against" "by" "from" "in favor of"))

                                     (PP :PVAL ("by")))
                           :NOM-SUBC ((P-WH :PVAL ("on" "of")
                                            :WH-S T)))

                                              (PP :PVAL ("by")))
                                    :PVAL1 *NONE*
                                    :NOM-SUBC ((P-WH :PVAL ("on" "of")
                                                     :HOW-S T
                                                     :HOW-TO-INF T)))
                 (NOM-NP :SUBJECT ((DET-POSS)
                                   (N-N-MOD)
                                   (PP :PVAL ("from" "of" "by")))
                         :OBJECT ((DET-POSS)
                                  (PP :PVAL ("of")))
                         :REQUIRED ((OBJECT))
                         :NOT ((AND1 :SUBJECT ((PP :PVAL ("from")))
                                     :OBJECT ((DET-POSS)))))
                 (NOM-NP-P-ING-OC :SUBJECT ((DET-POSS)
                                            (PP :PVAL ("by")))
                                  :OBJECT ((PP :PVAL ("of")))
                                  :NOM-SUBC ((P-ING :PVAL ("for")
                                                    :OC T)))
                 (NOM-THAT-S :SUBJECT ((DET-POSS)
                                       (PP :PVAL ("from" "of" "by")))
                             :NOM-SUBC ((SENT :THAT-S T)))
                 (NOM-NP-AS-NP :SUBJECT ((DET-POSS)
                                         (N-N-MOD)
                                         (PP :PVAL ("by")))
                               :OBJECT ((DET-POSS)
                                        (PP :PVAL ("of")))
                               :NOM-SUBC ((AS-NP-PHRASE :OC T)))

                 (DET-POSS)
                 (PP :PVAL ("between" "by" "of")))
     :SUBJ-ATTRIBUTE ((COMMUNICATOR))
     :OBJ-ATTRIBUTE ((NOT-COMMUNICATOR))
     :SUBJECT-PP-OF-FREQ ("2/50 BNC")

                                   (DET-POSS)

                         :OBJECT ((DET-POSS)
                                  (N-N-MOD)

                         :REQUIRED ((OBJECT))
                         :ROLE-FREQ ((SUBJ-FREQ :PP-OF-FREQ ("2/50 BNC"))))

                         :PVAL ("against" "about" "in favor of" "for" "over"

                                   (DET-POSS)
                                   (PP :PVAL ("by")))
                         :OBJECT ((DET-POSS)
                                  (N-N-MOD)
                                  (PP :PVAL ("of")))
                         :REQUIRED ((OBJECT)
                                    (SUBJECT)))
                 (NOM-INTRANS :SUBJECT ((DET-POSS)
                                        (N-N-MOD)
                                        (PP :PVAL ("of")))

                                        (PP :PVAL ("of" "by")))

                                :NOM-SUBC ((TO-INF :SC T)))

                                           (N-N-MOD)
                                           (PP :PVAL ("of" "by")))
                                 :NOM-SUBC ((SENT :S-SUBJUNCT T))))

     :PLURAL "negotiations"
     :PLURAL-FREQ "not rare"
     :VERB "negotiate"
     :NOM-TYPE ((VERB-NOM))
     :FEATURES ((NUNITP-BY-NUNITP-ALT))
     :VERB-SUBJ ((N-N-MOD)
                 (DET-POSS)
                 (PP :PVAL ("by" "of")))
     :SUBJ-ATTRIBUTE ((COMMUNICATOR))
     :OBJ-ATTRIBUTE ((NOT-COMMUNICATOR))
     :VERB-SUBC ((NOM-NP-PP :SUBJECT ((N-N-MOD)
                                      (DET-POSS)
                                      (PP :PVAL ("of" "by")))
                            :OBJECT ((DET-POSS)
                                     (N-N-MOD)
                                     (PP :PVAL ("of")))
                            :PVAL ("with")
                            :REQUIRED ((OBJECT)))
                 (NOM-NP :SUBJECT ((N-N-MOD)
                                   (DET-POSS)
                                   (PP :PVAL ("of" "by")))
                         :OBJECT ((DET-POSS)
                                  (N-N-MOD)
                                  (PP :PVAL ("of"))))
                 (NOM-PP :SUBJECT ((N-N-MOD)
                                   (DET-POSS)
                                   (PP :PVAL ("of" "by")))
                         :PVAL ("about" "for" "over" "with"))
                 (NOM-PP-PP :SUBJECT ((N-N-MOD)
                                      (DET-POSS)
                                      (PP :PVAL ("of" "by")))
                            :PVAL ("about" "for" "over")
                            :PVAL2 ("with"))
                 (NOM-NP-AT-NUNITP-PRED :SUBJECT ((N-N-MOD)
                                                  (DET-POSS)
                                                  (PP :PVAL ("of" "by")))
                                        :OBJECT ((N-N-MOD)
                                                 (PP :PVAL ("of")))
                                        :NOM-ROLE-FOR-NUNITP ((N-N-MOD))
                                        :PVAL ("at"))
                 (NOM-POSSING :SUBJECT ((N-N-MOD)
                                        (DET-POSS)
                                        (PP :PVAL ("of" "by")))
                              :NOM-SUBC ((P-POSSING :PVAL ("of"))))
                 (NOM-P-NP-TO-INF-VC :SUBJECT ((N-N-MOD)
                                               (DET-POSS)
                                               (PP :PVAL ("of" "by")))
                                     :PVAL ("with")
                                     :NOM-SUBC ((TO-INF :P-VC T))))
     :DONE T
     :REVISED ("reevesr@nonki  11:41 1/29/1999"
               "reevesr@nonki  15:13 2/9/1999"))

                                      (PP :PVAL ("by")))
                            :OBJECT ((DET-POSS)
                                     (N-N-MOD)
                                     (PP :PVAL ("of")))
                            :PVAL ("in" "for" "out of" "with")
                            :REQUIRED ((OBJECT))
                            :NOT ((AND1 :OBJECT ((N-N-MOD))
                                        :PVAL ("for"))))

                                  :OBJECT ((DET-POSS)
                                           (PP :PVAL ("of")))
                                  :NOM-SUBC ((P-ING :PVAL ("for")
                                                    :OC T)))

                                          (PP :PVAL ("by")))
                                :NOM-SUBC ((P-POSSING :PVAL ("for"))))

                                   :OBJECT ((PP :PVAL ("of")))
                                   :NOM-SUBC ((TO-INF :OC T))))

     :PLURAL "preparations"
     :PLURAL-FREQ "not rare"
     :VERB "prepare"
     :NOUN ((RESULT))
     :NOM-TYPE ((VERB-NOM))
     :VERB-SUBJ ((DET-POSS)
                 (N-N-MOD)
                 (PP :PVAL ("by" "of")))
     :SUBJ-ATTRIBUTE ((COMMUNICATOR))
     :SUBJECT-PP-OF-FREQ ("rare")
     :VERB-SUBC ((NOM-NP :SUBJECT ((DET-POSS)
                                   (PP :PVAL ("by")))
                         :OBJECT ((DET-POSS)
                                  (N-N-MOD)
                                  (PP :PVAL ("of"))))
                 (NOM-PP :SUBJECT ((DET-POSS)
                                   (N-N-MOD)
                                   (PP :PVAL ("of" "by")))
                         :PVAL ("for")
                         :ROLE-FREQ ((SUBJ-FREQ :PP-OF-FREQ ("rare"))))
                 (NOM-NP-FOR-NP :SUBJECT ((DET-POSS)
                                          (N-N-MOD)
                                          (PP :PVAL ("of" "by")))
                                :OBJECT ((DET-POSS)
                                         (N-N-MOD)
                                         (PP :PVAL ("of")))
                                :IND-OBJ ((PP :PVAL ("for"))
                                          (DET-POSS))
                                :ROLE-FREQ ((SUBJ-FREQ :PP-OF-FREQ ("rare"))))
                 (NOM-NP-P-ING-OC :SUBJECT ((DET-POSS)
                                            (N-N-MOD)
                                            (PP :PVAL ("by")))
                                  :OBJECT ((DET-POSS)
                                           (N-N-MOD))
                                  :NOM-SUBC ((P-ING :PVAL ("for")
                                                    :OC T)))
                 (NOM-FOR-TO-INF :SUBJECT ((DET-POSS)
                                           (N-N-MOD)
                                           (PP :PVAL ("by")))
                                 :NOM-SUBC ((FOR-TO-INF)))
                 (NOM-TO-INF-SC :SUBJECT ((DET-POSS)
                                          (PP :PVAL ("by")))
                                :NOM-SUBC ((TO-INF :SC T))))
     :DONE T
     :REVISED ("reevesr@sapir  21:20 12/1/1997"
               "reevesr@sapir  21:29 4/28/1998"

                             :NOM-SUBC ((SENT :THAT-S T))))
     :DONE T

                                                 :OC T))))

                 (NOM-NP-PP :SUBJECT ((DET-POSS)
                                      (N-N-MOD)
                                      (PP :PVAL ("by")))
                            :OBJECT ((DET-POSS)
                                     (N-N-MOD)
                                     (PP :PVAL ("of")))
                            :PVAL ("for"))
                 (NOM-NP-P-ING-OC :SUBJECT ((DET-POSS)
                                            (N-N-MOD)
                                            (PP :PVAL ("by")))
                                  :OBJECT ((DET-POSS)
                                           (PP :PVAL ("of")))
                                  :NOM-SUBC ((P-ING :PVAL ("for")
                                                    :OC T))
                                  :OPTIONAL ((OBJECT))))
     :DONE T
     :REVISED "Fall Update@sapir  17:7 1/13/1999")

                                          (PP :PVAL ("between"
                                                     "amongst"
                                                     "among"))

     :PLURAL-FREQ *NONE*
     :VERB "rearm"
     :NOM-TYPE ((VERB-NOM))
     :FEATURES ((SUBJ-OBJ-ALT))
     :VERB-SUBJ ((DET-POSS)
                 (PP :PVAL ("by")))
     :SUBJ-ATTRIBUTE ((COMMUNICATOR))
     :OBJ-ATTRIBUTE ((COMMUNICATOR))
     :VERB-SUBC ((NOM-NP :SUBJECT ((DET-POSS)
                                   (PP :PVAL ("by")))
                         :OBJECT ((DET-POSS)
                                  (N-N-MOD)
                                  (PP :PVAL ("of")))
                         :REQUIRED ((OBJECT)
                                    (SUBJECT)))
                 (NOM-INTRANS :SUBJECT ((DET-POSS)
                                        (N-N-MOD)
                                        (PP :PVAL ("of")))
                              :REQUIRED ((SUBJECT))
                              :ALTERNATES T)
                 (NOM-NP-PP :SUBJECT ((DET-POSS)
                                      (PP :PVAL ("by")))
                            :OBJECT ((DET-POSS)
                                     (PP :PVAL ("of")))
                            :PVAL ("against")))
     :DONE T
     :REVISED "reevesr@nonki  17:22 7/22/1999")

     :PLURAL "recognitions"
     :VERB "recognize"
     :NOM-TYPE ((VERB-NOM))
     :VERB-SUBJ ((DET-POSS)
                 (PP :PVAL ("by")))
     :SUBJ-ATTRIBUTE ((COMMUNICATOR))
     :VERB-SUBC ((NOM-NP-PP :SUBJECT ((DET-POSS)
                                      (PP :PVAL ("by")))
                            :OBJECT ((DET-POSS)
                                     (PP :PVAL ("of")))
                            :PVAL ("for"))
                 (NOM-NP :SUBJECT ((DET-POSS)
                                   (PP :PVAL ("by")))

                                  (PP :PVAL ("of"))))

                                         (PP :PVAL ("by")))
                               :OBJECT ((DET-POSS)
                                        (PP :PVAL ("of")))
                               :NOM-SUBC ((AS-NP-PHRASE :OC T)))
                 (NOM-HOW-S :SUBJECT ((DET-POSS)
                                      (PP :PVAL ("by")))
                            :NOM-SUBC ((P-WH :PVAL ("of")
                                             :HOW-S T)))
                 (NOM-THAT-S :SUBJECT ((DET-POSS)
                                       (PP :PVAL ("by")))
                             :NOM-SUBC ((SENT :THAT-S T))))
     :DONE T)
(NOM :ORTH "recollection"
     :PLURAL "recollections"
     :PLURAL-FREQ "not rare"
     :VERB "recollect"
     :VERB-SUBJ ((DET-POSS)
                 (PP :PVAL ("by" "of")))
     :SUBJ-ATTRIBUTE ((NHUMAN))
     :VERB-SUBC ((NOM-NP :SUBJECT ((DET-POSS)
                                   (PP :PVAL ("of" "by")))
                         :OBJECT ((PP :PVAL ("of")))
                         :REQUIRED ((SUBJECT :DET-POSS-ONLY T)))
                 (NOM-NP-AS-NP :SUBJECT ((DET-POSS)
                                         (PP :PVAL ("of" "by")))
                               :OBJECT ((PP :PVAL ("of")))
                               :NOM-SUBC ((AS-NP-PHRASE :OC T)))
                 (NOM-WH-S :SUBJECT ((DET-POSS)
                                     (PP :PVAL ("of" "by")))
                           :NOM-SUBC ((P-WH :PVAL ("of")
                                            :WHERE-WHEN-S T
                                            :WH-S T)))
                 (NOM-HOW-S :SUBJECT ((DET-POSS)
                                      (PP :PVAL ("of" "by")))
                            :NOM-SUBC ((P-WH :PVAL ("of")
                                             :HOW-S T)))
                 (NOM-THAT-S :SUBJECT ((DET-POSS)
                                       (PP :PVAL ("of" "by")))
                             :NOM-SUBC ((SENT :THAT-S T)))
                 (NOM-POSSING :SUBJECT ((DET-POSS)
                                        (PP :PVAL ("of" "by")))
                              :NOM-SUBC ((P-POSSING :PVAL ("of")))))
     :DONE T
     :REVISED "reevesr@jespersen  15:24 9/11/1998")
(NOM :ORTH "recommendation"
     :PLURAL "recommendations"
     :PLURAL-FREQ "not rare"
     :VERB "recommend"
     :NOUN ((RESULT))
     :NOUN-SUBC ((NOUN-PP :PVAL ("about" "on"))
                 (NOUN-P-POSSING :PVAL ("about" "on"))
                 (NOUN-P-WH-S :PVAL ("about" "on")))
     :NOM-TYPE ((VERB-NOM))
     :VERB-SUBJ ((DET-POSS)
                 (N-N-MOD)
                 (PP :PVAL ("by" "of")))
     :SUBJ-ATTRIBUTE ((COMMUNICATOR))
     :VERB-SUBC ((NOM-NP-PP :SUBJECT ((DET-POSS)
                                      (N-N-MOD)
                                      (PP :PVAL ("by")))
                            :OBJECT ((DET-POSS)
                                     (PP :PVAL ("of")))
                            :PVAL ("for" "to")
                            :REQUIRED ((OBJECT)))
                 (NOM-WH-S :SUBJECT ((DET-POSS)
                                     (N-N-MOD)
                                     (PP :PVAL ("by")))
                           :NOM-SUBC ((P-WH :PVAL ("of")
                                            :WH-S T)))
                 (NOM-POSSING-PP :SUBJECT ((DET-POSS)
                                           (N-N-MOD)
                                           (PP :PVAL ("by")))
                                 :PVAL ("to")
                                 :NOM-SUBC ((P-POSSING :PVAL ("of"))))
                 (NOM-POSSING :SUBJECT ((DET-POSS)
                                        (N-N-MOD)
                                        (PP :PVAL ("by")))
                              :NOM-SUBC ((P-POSSING :PVAL ("of"))))
                 (NOM-NP-ADVP :SUBJECT ((DET-POSS)
                                        (PP :PVAL ("by")))
                              :OBJECT ((DET-POSS)
                                       (PP :PVAL ("of")))
                              :NOM-SUBC ((ADJP)))
                 (NOM-PP :SUBJECT ((DET-POSS)
                                   (N-N-MOD)
                                   (PP :PVAL ("by")))
                         :PVAL ("against" "in favor of"))
                 (NOM-NP :SUBJECT ((DET-POSS)
                                   (N-N-MOD)
                                   (PP :PVAL ("of" "by")))
                         :OBJECT ((DET-POSS)
                                  (PP :PVAL ("of"))))
                 (NOM-NP-PP-AS-NP :SUBJECT ((DET-POSS)
                                            (PP :PVAL ("by")))
                                  :OBJECT ((DET-POSS)
                                           (PP :PVAL ("of")))
                                  :PVAL1 ("to")
                                  :NOM-SUBC ((AS-NP-PHRASE :OC T)))
                 (NOM-NP-AS-NP :SUBJECT ((DET-POSS)
                                         (PP :PVAL ("by")))
                               :OBJECT ((DET-POSS)
                                        (PP :PVAL ("of")))
                               :NOM-SUBC ((AS-NP-PHRASE :OC T)))
                 (NOM-S-SUBJUNCT :SUBJECT ((DET-POSS)
                                           (N-N-MOD)
                                           (PP :PVAL ("of" "by")))
                                 :NOM-SUBC ((SENT :S-SUBJUNCT T)))
                 (NOM-NP-TO-INF-OC :SUBJECT ((DET-POSS)
                                             (N-N-MOD)
                                             (PP :PVAL ("of" "by")))
                                   :OBJECT ((PP :PVAL ("of")))
                                   :NOM-SUBC ((TO-INF :OC T)))
                 (NOM-FOR-TO-INF :SUBJECT ((DET-POSS)
                                           (N-N-MOD)
                                           (PP :PVAL ("of" "by")))
                                 :NOM-SUBC ((FOR-TO-INF))))
     :DONE T
     :REVISED ("reevesr@sapir  19:30 12/22/1997" "macleod@sapir 13:45 11/27/98"
               "Fall Update@sapir  17:7 1/13/1999"))

                                              (PP :PVAL ("between" "of" "by")))
                                    :REQUIRED ((SUBJECT)))

                                   (N-N-MOD)
                                   (PP :PVAL ("of" "by")))
                         :PVAL ("with"))

                                   (N-N-MOD)

(NOM :ORTH "record"
     :PLURAL "records"
     :PLURAL-FREQ "not-rare"
     :VERB "record"
     :NOUN ((RARE-NOM)
            (RESULT))
     :NOM-TYPE ((VERB-NOM))
     :FEATURES ((NUNITP-BY-NUNITP-ALT))
     :VERB-SUBJ ((N-N-MOD)
                 (DET-POSS)
                 (PP :PVAL ("by")))
     :VERB-SUBC ((NOM-NP :SUBJECT ((N-N-MOD)
                                   (DET-POSS)
                                   (PP :PVAL ("by")))
                         :OBJECT ((N-N-MOD)
                                  (PP :PVAL ("of")))
                         :REQUIRED ((OBJECT)))
                 (NOM-NP-PP :SUBJECT ((N-N-MOD)
                                      (DET-POSS)
                                      (PP :PVAL ("by")))
                            :OBJECT ((PP :PVAL ("of")))
                            :PVAL ("at" "in" "for" "on"))
                 (NOM-INTRANS :SUBJECT ((N-N-MOD)
                                        (DET-POSS)
                                        (PP :PVAL ("by")))
                              :REQUIRED ((SUBJECT)))
                 (NOM-NP-AS-NP :SUBJECT ((N-N-MOD)
                                         (DET-POSS)
                                         (PP :PVAL ("by")))
                               :OBJECT ((PP :PVAL ("of")))
                               :NOM-SUBC ((AS-NP-PHRASE :OC T)))
                 (NOM-THAT-S :SUBJECT ((N-N-MOD)
                                       (DET-POSS)
                                       (PP :PVAL ("by")))
                             :NOM-SUBC ((SENT :THAT-S T)))
                 (NOM-WH-S :SUBJECT ((N-N-MOD)
                                     (DET-POSS)
                                     (PP :PVAL ("by")))
                           :NOM-SUBC ((P-WH :PVAL ("of")
                                            :WHERE-WHEN-S T
                                            :WH-S T)))
                 (NOM-NP-AT-NUNITP-PRED :SUBJECT ((N-N-MOD)
                                                  (DET-POSS)
                                                  (PP :PVAL ("by")))
                                        :OBJECT ((PP :PVAL ("of")))
                                        :NOM-ROLE-FOR-NUNITP ((N-N-MOD))
                                        :PVAL ("at")))
     :DONE T
     :REVISED ("barrett@jespersen  14:47 4/14/1998"
               "reevesr@jespersen  15:8 9/4/1998"))
(NOM :ORTH "recorder"
     :PLURAL "recorders"
     :VERB "record"
     :NOUN ((RARE-NOUN))
     :NOM-TYPE ((SUBJECT))
     :VERB-SUBC ((NOM-NP :OBJECT ((N-N-MOD)
                                  (PP :PVAL ("of")))
                         :REQUIRED ((OBJECT)))
                 (NOM-INTRANS)
                 (NOM-NP-PP :PVAL ("at" "in" "for" "on")
                            :NOM-ROLE-FOR-PVAL ((N-N-MOD))
                            :NOT ((AND1 :PVAL-NOM ("at" "in" "for")))))
     :DONE T)
(NOM :ORTH "recovery"
     :PLURAL "recoveries"
     :PLURAL-FREQ "not rare"
     :VERB "recover"
     :NOM-TYPE ((VERB-NOM))
     :VERB-SUBJ ((DET-POSS)
                 (N-N-MOD)
                 (PP :PVAL ("by" "of")))
     :VERB-SUBC ((NOM-NP-PP :SUBJECT ((DET-POSS)
                                      (N-N-MOD)
                                      (PP :PVAL ("by")))
                            :OBJECT ((DET-POSS)
                                     (N-N-MOD))
                            :PVAL ("in" "from" "through" "out of")
                            :REQUIRED ((OBJECT))
                            :NOT ((AND1 :SUBJECT ((N-N-MOD))
                                        :OBJECT ((DET-POSS)
                                                 (N-N-MOD))
                                        :PVAL ("through"))
                                  (AND2 :SUBJECT ((N-N-MOD))
                                        :OBJECT ((N-N-MOD)))))
                 (NOM-INTRANS :SUBJECT ((DET-POSS)
                                        (PP :PVAL ("by")))
                              :REQUIRED ((SUBJECT)))
                 (NOM-PP :SUBJECT ((DET-POSS)
                                   (PP :PVAL ("of" "by")))
                         :PVAL ("from")
                         :NOM-ROLE-FOR-PVAL ((N-N-MOD))
                         :NOT ((AND1 :SUBJECT ((PP :PVAL ("of")))
                                     :NOM-ROLE-FOR-PVAL ((N-N-MOD)))))
                 (NOM-NP :SUBJECT ((DET-POSS)
                                   (PP :PVAL ("by")))
                         :OBJECT ((DET-POSS)
                                  (PP :PVAL ("of")))
                         :REQUIRED ((OBJECT))))
     :DONE T
     :REVISED ("reevesr@sapir  18:22 2/13/1998"
               "Fall Update@sapir  17:7 1/13/1999"))

                 (DET-POSS)
                 (PP :PVAL ("by")))

     :OBJ-ATTRIBUTE ((NHUMAN))

                                   (DET-POSS)
                                   (PP :PVAL ("by")))
                         :OBJECT ((DET-POSS)
                                  (PP :PVAL ("of")))
                         :REQUIRED ((OBJECT)))
                 (NOM-NP-PP :SUBJECT ((N-N-MOD)
                                      (DET-POSS)
                                      (PP :PVAL ("by")))
                            :OBJECT ((DET-POSS)
                                     (PP :PVAL ("of")))
                            :PVAL ("for" "from"))
                 (NOM-INTRANS :SUBJECT ((N-N-MOD)
                                        (DET-POSS)

                 (NOM-NP-AS-NP :SUBJECT ((N-N-MOD)
                                         (DET-POSS)
                                         (PP :PVAL ("by")))
                               :OBJECT ((DET-POSS)

     :PLURAL "referrals"
     :PLURAL-FREQ "not rare"
     :VERB "refer"
     :NOM-TYPE ((VERB-NOM))
     :VERB-SUBJ ((DET-POSS)
                 (PP :PVAL ("by")))
     :SUBJ-ATTRIBUTE ((COMMUNICATOR))
     :VERB-SUBC ((NOM-NP-PP :SUBJECT ((DET-POSS)
                                      (PP :PVAL ("by")))
                            :OBJECT ((DET-POSS)
                                     (PP :PVAL ("of")))
                            :PVAL ("for" "to")
                            :NOT ((AND1 :OBJECT ((DET-POSS))
                                        :PVAL ("to"))
                                  (AND2 :OBJECT ((PP :PVAL ("of")))
                                        :PVAL ("for")))))
     :COMMENTS "NP-AS-NP is really PP-AS-NP  PVAL  \"TO"
     :DONE T

                                     :PVAL ("about"))))

                             :NOM-SUBC ((P-WH :PVAL ("on")
                                              :WH-S T))))

     :PLURAL "reports"
     :PLURAL-FREQ "not-rare"
     :VERB "report"
     :NOUN ((RESULT))
     :NOM-TYPE ((VERB-NOM))
     :VERB-SUBJ ((N-N-MOD)
                 (DET-POSS)
                 (PP :PVAL ("by")))
     :SUBJ-ATTRIBUTE ((COMMUNICATOR))
     :VERB-SUBC ((NOM-NP-PP :SUBJECT ((N-N-MOD)
                                      (DET-POSS)
