                            :OBJECT ((N-N-MOD)
                                     (PP :PVAL ("of")))
                            :PVAL ("to")
                            :REQUIRED ((OBJECT)))
                 (NOM-POSSING :SUBJECT ((N-N-MOD)
                                        (DET-POSS)
                                        (PP :PVAL ("by")))
                              :NOM-SUBC ((P-POSSING :PVAL ("of"))))
                 (NOM-NP :SUBJECT ((N-N-MOD)
                                   (DET-POSS)
                                   (PP :PVAL ("by")))
                         :OBJECT ((PP :PVAL ("of"))))
                 (NOM-PP :SUBJECT ((N-N-MOD)
                                   (DET-POSS)
                                   (PP :PVAL ("by")))
                         :PVAL ("about" "at" "on" "for" "to"))
                 (NOM-PP-PP :SUBJECT ((N-N-MOD)
                                      (DET-POSS)
                                      (PP :PVAL ("by")))
                            :PVAL ("to"))
                 (NOM-NP-ING :SUBJECT ((DET-POSS)
                                       (PP :PVAL ("by")))
                             :OBJECT ((PP :PVAL ("of")))
                             :NOM-SUBC ((ING :OC T)))
                 (NOM-P-NP-ING :SUBJECT ((N-N-MOD)
                                         (DET-POSS)
                                         (PP :PVAL ("by")))
                               :PVAL ("about" "on")
                               :NOM-SUBC ((ING :P-OC T)))
                 (NOM-S :SUBJECT ((N-N-MOD)
                                  (DET-POSS)
                                  (PP :PVAL ("by")))
                        :NOM-SUBC ((SENT :THAT-S T)))
                 (NOM-PP-THAT-S :SUBJECT ((N-N-MOD)
                                          (DET-POSS)
                                          (PP :PVAL ("by")))
                                :PVAL1 ("to")
                                :NOM-SUBC ((SENT :THAT-S T)))
                 (NOM-WH-S :SUBJECT ((N-N-MOD)
                                     (DET-POSS)
                                     (PP :PVAL ("by")))
                           :NOM-SUBC ((P-WH :PVAL ("of")
                                            :WHERE-WHEN-S T
                                            :WH-S T)))
                 (NOM-P-WH-S :SUBJECT ((N-N-MOD)
                                       (DET-POSS)
                                       (PP :PVAL ("by")))
                             :NOM-SUBC ((P-WH :PVAL ("about" "on")
                                              :WH-S T))))
     :DONE T
     :REVISED ("barrett@jespersen  14:4 4/15/1998"
               "barrett@jespersen  14:46 4/15/1998"

                                         (PP :PVAL ("by")))
                               :OBJECT ((DET-POSS)
                                        (N-N-MOD)
                                        (PP :PVAL ("of")))
                               :IND-OBJ ((PP :PVAL ("to"))))
                 (NOM-NP-ADVP :SUBJECT ((DET-POSS)
                                        (N-N-MOD)
                                        (PP :PVAL ("by")))
                              :OBJECT ((DET-POSS)
                                       (N-N-MOD)
                                       (PP :PVAL ("of")))
                              :NOM-SUBC ((ADVP))))
     :DONE T
     :REVISED ("reevesr@sapir  17:53 6/12/1997"
               "Fall Update@sapir  17:8 1/13/1999"))

                 (NOM-NP-AS-NP :SUBJECT ((DET-POSS)
                                         (PP :PVAL ("by")))
                               :OBJECT ((DET-POSS)
                                        (PP :PVAL ("of")))
                               :NOM-SUBC ((AS-NP-PHRASE :OC T)))
                 (NOM-THAT-S :SUBJECT ((N-N-MOD)
                                       (DET-POSS)
                                       (PP :PVAL ("of" "by")))
                             :NOM-SUBC ((SENT :THAT-S T)))
                 (NOM-P-POSSING :SUBJECT ((DET-POSS))
                                :NOM-SUBC ((P-POSSING :PVAL ("to")))))
     :COMMENTS "obj-attribute is too broad for np-pp"
     :DONE T
     :REVISED "reevesr@nonki  18:27 2/2/1999")

                                              (PP :PVAL ("of" "by")))
                                    :PVAL1 ("to")

                                :PVAL1 ("to")
                                :NOM-SUBC ((SENT :THAT-S T)))
                 (NOM-THAT-S :SUBJECT ((DET-POSS)
                                       (PP :PVAL ("of" "by")))
                             :NOM-SUBC ((SENT :THAT-S T))))
     :COMMENTS "J's suggestion [PP to [Bob]][P about][what todo]"
     :DONE T
     :REVISED ("barrett@jespersen  15:5 1/23/1998"

                 (NOM-PP-PP :SUBJECT ((N-N-MOD)
                                      (DET-POSS)
                                      (PP :PVAL ("by")))
                            :PVAL ("about" "of" "on")
                            :PVAL2 ("to" "with"))
                 (NOM-PP :SUBJECT ((N-N-MOD)
                                   (DET-POSS)
                                   (PP :PVAL ("by")))
                         :PVAL ("about" "on" "of" "to" "with"))
                 (NOM-ADVP :SUBJECT ((N-N-MOD)
                                     (DET-POSS)
                                     (PP :PVAL ("by")))
                           :NOM-SUBC ((ADVP))))
     :DONE T
     :REVISED "reevesr@nonki  15:51 3/10/1999")

(NOM :ORTH "will"
     :PLURAL "wills"
     :PLURAL-FREQ "rare"
     :VERB "will"
     :NOM-TYPE ((VERB-NOM))
     :VERB-SUBJ ((DET-POSS)
                 (PP :PVAL ("by" "of")))
     :SUBJ-ATTRIBUTE ((NHUMAN))
     :VERB-SUBC ((NOM-NP :SUBJECT ((DET-POSS)
                                   (PP :PVAL ("of" "by")))
                         :OBJECT ((NONE)))
                 (NOM-S-SUBJUNCT :SUBJECT ((DET-POSS)
                                           (PP :PVAL ("of" "by")))
                                 :NOM-SUBC ((SENT :S-SUBJUNCT T)))
                 (NOM-NP-TO-INF-OC :SUBJECT ((DET-POSS)
                                             (PP :PVAL ("of" "by")))
                                   :OBJECT ((PP :PVAL ("for")))
                                   :NOM-SUBC ((TO-INF :OC T))))
     :DONE T
     :REVISED ("barrett@sapir  14:11 4/28/1998"
               "barrett@sapir  12:44 4/29/1998"))
(NOM :ORTH "winner"
     :PLURAL "winners"
     :VERB "win"
     :NOM-TYPE ((SUBJECT))
     :VERB-SUBC ((NOM-NP :OBJECT ((N-N-MOD)
                                  (PP :PVAL ("of")))
                         :REQUIRED ((OBJECT)))
                 (NOM-PP :PVAL ("against"))
                 (NOM-INTRANS)
                 (NOM-NP-PP :OBJECT ((PP :PVAL ("of")))
                            :PVAL ("against" "from" "to")
                            :REQUIRED ((OBJECT))))
     :DONE T
     :REVISED "barrett@jespersen  13:19 7/18/1997")
(NOM :ORTH "withdrawal"
     :PLURAL "withdrawals"
     :PLURAL-FREQ "not rare"
     :VERB "withdraw"
     :NOM-TYPE ((VERB-NOM))
     :VERB-SUBJ ((DET-POSS)
                 (PP :PVAL ("by")))
     :SUBJ-ATTRIBUTE ((COMMUNICATOR))
     :OBJ-ATTRIBUTE ((NOT-NTIME)
                     (NOT-NUNIT))
     :VERB-SUBC ((NOM-NP-PP :SUBJECT ((DET-POSS)
                                      (PP :PVAL ("by")))
                            :OBJECT ((DET-POSS)
                                     (N-N-MOD)
                                     (PP :PVAL ("of")))
                            :PVAL ("from")
                            :REQUIRED ((OBJECT)))
                 (NOM-INTRANS :SUBJECT ((DET-POSS)
                                        (PP :PVAL ("by")))
                              :REQUIRED ((SUBJECT)))
                 (NOM-PP :SUBJECT ((DET-POSS)
                                   (PP :PVAL ("by")))
                         :PVAL ("into" "from" "to"))
                 (NOM-NP :SUBJECT ((DET-POSS)
                                   (PP :PVAL ("by")))
                         :OBJECT ((DET-POSS)
                                  (N-N-MOD)
                                  (PP :PVAL ("of")))
                         :REQUIRED ((OBJECT))))
     :DONE T
     :REVISED "reevesr@sapir  19:18 3/18/1998")
(NOM :ORTH "work"
     :PLURAL "works"
     :PLURAL-FREQ "6:57402 plur:sing"
     :VERB "work"
     :NOM-TYPE ((VERB-NOM))
     :VERB-SUBJ ((DET-POSS)
                 (PP :PVAL ("by" "of")))
     :SUBJ-ATTRIBUTE ((COMMUNICATOR))
     :VERB-SUBC ((NOM-INTRANS :SUBJECT ((DET-POSS)
                                        (PP :PVAL ("of" "by")))
                              :REQUIRED ((SUBJECT)))
                 (NOM-PP :SUBJECT ((DET-POSS)
                                   (PP :PVAL ("of" "by")))
                         :PVAL ("among" "against" "around" "at" "from" "in"
                                "for" "on" "through" "toward" "with")
                         :NOM-ROLE-FOR-PVAL ((N-N-MOD)))
                 (NOM-P-ING-SC :SUBJECT ((DET-POSS)
                                         (PP :PVAL ("of" "by")))
                               :NOM-SUBC ((P-ING :PVAL ("toward")
                                                 :SC T)))
                 (NOM-TO-INF-SC :SUBJECT ((DET-POSS)
                                          (PP :PVAL ("of" "by")))
                                :NOM-SUBC ((TO-INF :SC T))))
     :COMMENTS "noun usage designates the LOCATION that work is performed in"
     :DONE T
     :REVISED ("reevesr@sapir  18:34 4/7/1998"
               "Fall Update@sapir  17:8 1/13/1999"))

     :PLURAL "workers"
     :VERB "work"
     :NOM-TYPE ((SUBJECT))
     :VERB-SUBC ((NOM-NP :OBJECT ((N-N-MOD)))
                 (NOM-PP :PVAL ("on")
                         :NOM-ROLE-FOR-PVAL ((N-N-MOD))))
     :DONE T
     :REVISED ("barrett@jespersen  13:24 12/1/1997"
               "barrett@jespersen  12:22 1/12/1998"))
